name: From Primordial Egg
description:
Originally made for the TIGSource Commonplace Book competition in 2008, based on the line, "What hatches from primordial egg".

Deep within a forgotten temple, an ancient egg hatches to reveal a dinosaur, who proceeds to rampage his way out through the archaeologists working there.  Thankfully, you do not play as the archaeologists.

You grow and evolve by eating, and evolve differently depending on how you play.  Attack by biting a lot, and you'll get stronger jaws, get hit in the body a lot and you'll end up with a defensive spine, etc.

Controls (can be changed in game)

Arrow keys to Move

X to Jump

Z to Bite

C to Kick

ESC to Pause/Quit
